name: paintbox
summary: A colourful, happy scheme with high contrast
description:
A colourful, happy scheme with high contrast.
http://img176.imageshack.us/img176/8033/vimpaintboxcc4.png
install_details: Place in your Vim colour schemes directory (probably ~/.vim/colors) for autoloading on startup and :source it or restart Vim, or just anywhere and :source it.
